name: Bubble SIege
description:
Bubble Siege is a Tower Defense-style game in VR. You play a “giant monster” summoned by a wizard to help a kingdom of bubble people from their wretched enemies, another very similar kingdom of bubble people. Use your magic powers (which will grow more powerful with experience) to pop the “bad guy” bubbles and save the “good guy” bubbles.

This is Version 0.5, which means it’s not finished but it’s ready to play. I intend to eventually expand it with a number of features, achievements, and additional levels. These may include but are not limited to:
  • Castle/Keep upgrades
  • More levels
  • More Bad Guys
  • More Player Powers
  • More Defenses
  • Achievements
  • Support for other languages, OS’s, hardware, etc.
